name: SILENT AUTUMN
description:
Do you like the crystal silence in the autumnal woods?
It's always so quiet there... magically quiet.

Be nice and respectful to the Spirit of the forest and don't make a sound. 

He can't see you, but he can hear you from a long distance. 
If you step on dry leaves or bushes, he'll catch and punish you. 

The silence of autumn must be unbreakable.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The game was developed by KONEV & WhiteBulL - Tile Games ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Source:
